articles.title: Senate Passes Bill to Target Anti-Asian Hate Crimes - The New York Times
articles.description: The bipartisan vote amounts to the first legislative action either chamber of Congress has taken to bolster law enforcement’s response to rising attacks on the Asian-American community.

articles.title: I'm fully vaccinated against COVID-19. How long will the protection last? - Yahoo News
articles.description: With so many Americans becoming immunized, it's natural to look ahead and wonder how long this protection will last. The answer: No one knows.

articles.author: Channel NewsAsia
articles.title: Train To Busan actor to star in, produce US remake of Korean series Trap - CNA
articles.description: Ma Dong-seok, who’s also known as Don Lee, will play a detective investigating a group of hunters who attacked a famous news anchor and his family while on a camping trip. This is a rare instance of an American remake of a Korean show featuring a Korean lead.
